35154a02-cf1d-40fd-861e-ac66338669cf.name: Silence
35154a02-cf1d-40fd-861e-ac66338669cf.notes: Bonuses help only when hearing is the only sense that can be used to detect you.

features.situation: to Stealth when you are perfectly motionless
to Stealth if moving (even in armor, etc.)
from past victims and anyone with Empathy
to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture
